abstract.text: Learn how you can easily prototype and build apps with Swift Playgrounds. We‚Äôll show you how to create an app from a blank project, build its interface with SwiftUI, and use Swift Package Manager to add extra functionality from an open source package. We‚Äôll also explore how you can debug issues using Previews and the console and take you through submitting an app to App Store Connect for distribution via TestFlight.

metadata.title: Build your first app in Swift Playgrounds

abstract.text: Learn how you can build guided instructional content designed for Swift Playgrounds. Follow along with us as we explore how you can add a guide to a completed sample code project. We‚Äôll demonstrate how to add tasks to your learning center to show off relevant code and optional experiment tasks that encourage learners to extend the project with code of their own.

abstract.text: Xcode 14, Swift 5.7, iOS 16, macOS 13 (Ventura), tvOS 16, watchOS 9.
